meanings.definition: A person who rebuts or refutes something.
meanings.sent1: The skilled debater was known as one of the best rebutters in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The team of lawyers hired a professional rebutters to strengthen their case.
meanings.sent3: The funny thing about the rebutters was that they always had a clever comeback ready.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp mind worked like a rebutters, quickly countering any argument thrown her way.
meanings.sent5: In the courtroom, the rebutters stood tall, ready to challenge any statement made.

meanings.definition: Devices or materials used for rebutting or refuting something.
meanings.sent1: The debate club had a collection of advanced rebutters to support their arguments.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used various high-tech rebutters to disprove the theory.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with colorful rebutters, making the lesson more engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her bag was like a magic box of rebutters, always containing the perfect tool for any discussion.
meanings.sent5: The arsenal of rebutters in the workshop impressed all the visitors with its variety.
